q: to Sergey Bring a renewed focus on improving Google products-- that is, dealing with the first three challenges listed above. Note how Eric Schmidt , in href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html" target="_blank"> a blog post, said the management change would speed up decision making. Nimbler leadership is what the company needs to overhaul search, build a social network and figure out the best strategy for operating systems. As for advocacy, that's all Eric Schmidt . saga of the`` American Idol'' phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series`` Pop Idol'' right up to Mr. Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy American Idol: The Untold Story. Currently an entertainment columnist for the website the Daily Beast and a Vanity Fair contributing editor, Mr. Rushfield blogged about`` American Idol'' for three years for the Los Angeles Times and clearly knows his subject well.

I believe Larry Page is ready to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.'' ' husband, Mark Kelson , on Saturday night. The astronaut described the latest progress in his wife's recovery after the Jan. 8 shooting.`` She's making progress every day,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury that she did. Gabrielle Giffords was the primary target in the attack outside a Safeway Mark Kelsonet in Tucson, where the Arizona Democrat had gone to meet with constituents. According to Simon Cowell there will be more mentoring of the talent than just critiquing the performers. I wanted to make a show where I, along with my fellow judges, help competitors on a regular basis, said Simon Cowell , whose music industry experience is mostly on the record label end.`` It's more interesting to me because I have a lot more to do with that. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley`` has Michael Vick capabilities.''
